game.name: Clue: Murder By Death
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A story-rich detective mystery set in 1930s England. Investigate a murder inside a sprawling manor, interrogate suspicious residents, and make meaningful choices to uncover the truth — before Scotland Yard arrives.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A story-rich detective mystery set in 1930s England. Investigate a murder inside a sprawling manor, interrogate suspicious residents, and make meaningful choices to uncover the truth — before Scotland Yard arrives.
